scripts.clean.all: yarn clean.cache && rm -f yarn.lock && lerna run clean && rm -rf node_modules; for d in packages/*/node_modules; do echo $d; rm -rf $d; done && yarn clean.build
scripts.clean.build: for d in packages/*/build; do echo $d; rm -rf $d; done
scripts.rebuild: yarn clean.all && yarn && yarn build.dev; yarn cache.tests
scripts.upgrade.packages: yarn upgrade --latest && rm -f yarn.lock && yarn | true && yarn fix.lint || true
scripts.upgrade.packages.workspaces: yarn && for d in packages/*; do cd $d; yarn-upgrade-all; cd ../..; done
scripts.upgrade.packages.all: yarn install && yarn upgrade.packages.workspaces && yarn upgrade.packages
scripts.upgrade.packages.test: yarn upgrade.packages.all && yarn lint && yarn build.dev && yarn test
